lang.name: Olha Vlasova
lang.aboutText: I have been working as a frontend developer for the last three years. Have experience with java script, html, css, sass, json, pixi.js, pixi-spine, Figma, Photoshop, I am confident with git. I worked with WordPress and Magenta like Content manager. I have experience working with self-written game engines. I speak English at the level of communication.
lang.education_step2: National Technical University of Agriculture named afterPetro Vasilenka
lang.mySkils-text: Ready to learn and add to my list of skills.
lang.managerTask: Searching and processing photos, filling the site with content
